column5: This beautiful home is a 3 bedroom/2 bath. It has a King, Queen, Full size beds in each of the rooms and a sofa sleeper in the living room. It has granite counter tops in the full size kitchen with stove and fridge. The showers have travertine tile and the convenience of washer/dryer. You will have access to the community indoor and outdoor pool, hot tub, 18 hole par 3 golf course,miniature golf,pool tables,tennis,basketball courts,shuffle boards,library,gym, and ping pong tables.
column8: Come relax at Long Island Village!
